pkgmetadata.longdescription: markdown2: A fast and complete Python implementation of Markdown.Markdown is a text-to-HTML filter; it translates an easy-to-read /easy-to-write structured text format into HTML. Markdown's textformat is most similar to that of plain text email, and supportsfeatures such as headers, *emphasis*, code blocks, blockquotes, andlinks. -- http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/This is a fast and complete Python implementation of the Markdownspec. See http://github.com/trentm/python-markdown2 for more info.
